Posts.EditableText: I can't pretend I'm not incredibly proud of this. Thanks to anyone who helped answer my recent spate of questions regarding fade-ins/outs and alternatives to clearscreen, especially Jay. Honestly, I uploaded this just to check it all worked with the online player, but now that it's there I can't help but share http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... g/template [b:30ipjas4][color=#FF0000:30ipjas4][make sure your speakers are on][/color:30ipjas4][/b:30ipjas4] Look at is as a teaser for a game I'll probably never finish
